channel.title: default sys-whonix color to purple, or other color but not black
channel.description:
I will open an issue on Qubes issues after I get some feedback here, that is why the category is not dev or qubes-whonix.
[https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Screenshots#Reload_Firewall](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Screenshots#Reload_Firewall)
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Screenshots#/media/File:Whonix_reload_firewall_GUI.png
sys-whonix using the color purple.
Why, it is not a template, it is network connected, tor has its risks of bypassing firewalls.
Anyone can set any color, I just think the default should not be black.

item.title: default sys-whonix color to purple, or other color but not black
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yeah. Why not. I don’t have a strong opinion about it. Can be suggested to Qubes. Let’s see what they say.

Read full topic
